page.title: 08FIRE BRIGADE.
page.content: The main job of the{fire brigade}is to put out fires. They help people who are trapped in fires. The{firemen}have to wear oxygen masks so they can still work in smoky conditions. Their main task is to get the people out and then put out the fire. They often have to give first aid and try to revive anyone who might be dying.{Bankhall {fire station}is near the docks so they have special portable equipment for fighting fires in the holds of ships. But we need{firemen}for many other jobs for example: to rescue a cat stuck in a tree, to free somebody's head stuck in railings or if a car crashes they are needed to get the trapped passengers out.{Firemen help {us. (Diane King)
